name: The Elystan Dining Table
description: The Elystan is a stunning dining or centre table of contemporary design that will transform any dining room, entrance way or lobby with its sleek slimline top and chic silhouette, this the perfect choice for the style-conscious homeowner. Geometrically intriguing with the contrasting curves of the spherical top and conical base, the Elystan is available in any of DAVIDSONs luxury finishes including a sublime bronze, a glamorous metallic surface part of the DAVIDSON range. A high gloss or polyester lacquer finish is highly durable to scratching and easy to clean. Aside from being eminently practical, the finish is indisputably alluring, radiating a relaxed poise.
